what: The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru
title: The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru
text: …El libro rojo de las plantas endémicas del Perú constituye, en este aspecto una herramienta fundamental para determinar las medidas necesarias para la conservación de la flora peruana. - Kember Mejía Carhuanca flora Peru one richest New World, 14,000 species, 5,508 taxa treated endemic. represents significant proportion South American flora, highlighting importance Peru conservation New World flora. pandemic package takes data red book endemic plants Peru update taxonomic information species included using Taxonomic Name Resolution Service api. goal ppendemic provide access endemic plant species data Peru.

title: The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru
text: can install latest development version GitHub :

title: The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru
text: Data published made available Revista Peruana de Biología volume 13 number 2 available , 2006. Edited Blanca León et al.

title: The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru
text: cite ppendemic package, please use:

title: The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru
text: Data originally published : León, B., Pitman, N., & Roque Gamarra, J. E. (2006). Introducción las plantas endémicas del Perú. Revista Peruana de Biologia, 13(2), 9s-22s.

title: pep_by_reg — pep_by_reg
text: List endemic species within region.

title: pep_by_reg — pep_by_reg
text: ... Atomic element vector species names.

title: pep_by_reg — pep_by_reg
text: tibble two variables: species name regions species found

title: pep_by_reg — pep_by_reg
code: # Basic usage ### One name pep_by_reg("Aphelandra latibracteata") #> Regions:  with 0 species #> # A tibble: 0 × 2 #> # ℹ 2 variables: registro_dep <chr>, accepted_name <chr> ### Set of names species <- c("Sanchezia filamentosa", "Aphelandra latibracteata") pep_by_reg(species) #> Regions:  with 0 species #> # A tibble: 0 × 2 #> # ℹ 2 variables: registro_dep <chr>, accepted_name <chr>

title: pep_check — pep_check
text: function automates process check plant species endemic Perú.

title: pep_check — pep_check
text: x atomic character string vector species names verified endemic species

title: pep_check — pep_check
text: vector information species names tested: ) "endemic" species endemic Perú; b)  "endemic" species endemic Perú; c)"binary name" genera submitted; d) "taxon state undefined" submitted species name taxonomic status undetermined.

title: pep_check — pep_check
code: # Basic usage spp <- c("Hedyosmum", "Miconia alpina", "Persea sp2") pep_check(spp) #> [1] "not binary name"       "endemic"               "taxon state undefined"

title: pep_regdep — pep_regdep
text: Help find region endemic species described

title: pep_regdep — pep_regdep
text: ... Atomic element vector species names.

title: pep_regdep — pep_regdep
text: tibble two variables: species name regions species found

title: pep_regdep — pep_regdep
code: # Basic usage ### One name pep_regdep("Aphelandra latibracteata") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   accepted_name            registro_dep                      #>   <chr>                    <chr>                             #> 1 Aphelandra latibracteata Huánuco-Loreto-San Martín-Ucayali ### Set of names species <- c("Sanchezia filamentosa", "Aphelandra latibracteata") pep_regdep(species) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   accepted_name            registro_dep                      #>   <chr>                    <chr>                             #> 1 Aphelandra latibracteata Huánuco-Loreto-San Martín-Ucayali #> 2 Sanchezia filamentosa    Huánuco-San Martín                pep_regdep("Sanchezia filamentosa", "Aphelandra latibracteata") #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   accepted_name            registro_dep                      #>   <chr>                    <chr>                             #> 1 Aphelandra latibracteata Huánuco-Loreto-San Martín-Ucayali #> 2 Sanchezia filamentosa    Huánuco-San Martín

title: pep_regdep_map — pep_regdep_map

title: pep_regecol — pep_regecol
text: List endemic species within ecological region. List ecological region ids full name, based Zamora, C. 1996. AA   = Altoandina BHA  = Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos BHMP = Bosques Muy Húmedos Premontanos BMHM = Bosques Muy Húmedos Montanos BMHP = Bosques Muy Húmedos Premontanos BPM  = Bosques Pluviales Montanos BS   = Bosques Secos DCT  = Desierto Cálido Tropical DST  = Desierto Semicálido Tropical MA   = Mesoandina MDE  = Matorral Desértico NDE  = Matorral Desértico PAR  = Páramo PD   = Puna Desértica PSH  = Puna Húmeda y Seca

title: pep_regecol — pep_regecol
text: region Atomic element vector ecological region names, shrot long name. specie Atomic element vector species names.

title: pep_regecol — pep_regecol
text: tibble

title: pep_regecol — pep_regecol
text: León, B., J. Roque, C. Ulloa Ulloa, N. C. . Pitman, P. M. Jørgensen & . Cano Echevarría. 2006 (2007). El Libro Rojo de las Plantas Endémicas del Perú. Revista Peruana Biol. 13(núm. 2 especial): 1s–971s ZAMORA, C. 1996. Las regiones ecológicas del Perú. En: Rodríguez, L.O. (ed.), Diversidad Biológica del Perú: Zonas Prioritarias para su Conservación, pp. 137-141. FANPE, GTZ-INRENA. Lima, Perú.

title: pep_regecol — pep_regecol
code: # By Region ID pep_regecol("BHA") #> Region: BHA with 754 species #> # A tibble: 756 × 3 #>    region_id region_eco                 accepted_name               #>    <chr>     <chr>                      <chr>                       #>  1 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos Aphelandra cuscoensis       #>  2 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos Aphelandra latibracteata    #>  3 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos Justicia manserichensis     #>  4 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos Mendoncia peruviana         #>  5 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos Mendoncia tarapotana        #>  6 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos Odontophyllum cuscoensis    #>  7 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos Oplonia hutchisonii         #>  8 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos Pachystachys killipii       #>  9 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos Pachystachys incarnata      #> 10 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos Pachystachys longibracteata #> # ℹ 746 more rows pep_regecol(c("MA", "BS")) #> Regions: BS - MA with 1451 species #> # A tibble: 1,468 × 3 #>    region_id region_eco    accepted_name              #>    <chr>     <chr>         <chr>                      #>  1 MA        Mesoandina    Aphelandra juninensis      #>  2 MA        Mesoandina    Aphelandra viscosa         #>  3 MA        Mesoandina    Dicliptera porphyrea       #>  4 MA        Mesoandina    Justicia weberbaueri       #>  5 BS        Bosques Secos Justicia weberbaueri       #>  6 MA        Mesoandina    Justicia alpina            #>  7 BS        Bosques Secos Tetramerium denudatum      #>  8 BS        Bosques Secos Tetramerium peruvianum     #>  9 BS        Bosques Secos Tetramerium sagasteguianum #> 10 BS        Bosques Secos Tetramerium surcubambense  #> # ℹ 1,458 more rows  # By species name pep_regecol(specie = "Aphelandra weberbaueri") #> # A tibble: 2 × 3 #>   region_id region_eco                      accepted_name          #>   <chr>     <chr>                           <chr>                  #> 1 BMHM      Bosques Muy Húmedos Montanos    Aphelandra weberbaueri #> 2 BMHP      Bosques Muy Húmedos Premontanos Aphelandra weberbaueri  especie <-  c("Aphelandra weberbaueri", "Odontophyllum cuscoensis") pep_regecol(specie = especie) #> # A tibble: 3 × 3 #>   region_id region_eco                      accepted_name            #>   <chr>     <chr>                           <chr>                    #> 1 BMHM      Bosques Muy Húmedos Montanos    Aphelandra weberbaueri   #> 2 BMHP      Bosques Muy Húmedos Premontanos Aphelandra weberbaueri   #> 3 BHA       Bosques Húmedos Amazónicos      Odontophyllum cuscoensis

what: ppendemic: The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru — ppendemic-package
title: ppendemic: The Red Book of Endemic Plants of Peru — ppendemic-package
text: Gives help access information "Red Book Endemic Plants Peru". package contains database cleaned standardized botanical data including occurrence taxonomic data. original source found "León, Blanca, Nigel Pitman, y José Roque. (2006). Introducción Las Plantas Endémicas Del Perú"doi:10.15381/rpb.v13i2.1782 https://revistasinvestigacion.unmsm.edu.pe/index.php/rpb/issue/view/153.

Specie name and ecological region for plants listed in El  libro
rojo  de  las  plantas  endémicas  del  Perú — regiones_ecologicas

Specie name and ecological region for plants listed in El  libro
rojo  de  las  plantas  endémicas  del  Perú — regiones_ecologicas
text: tibble 6778 rows 5 variables: accepted_family factor denoting plant family accepted_genus factor denoting plant genus accepted_name factor denoting plant species region_id factor denoting short name ecological region region_eco factor denoting ecological region names. Based : "ZAMORA, C. 1996. Las regiones ecológicas del Perú. En: Rodríguez, L.O. (ed.), Diversidad Biológica del Perú: Zonas Prioritarias para su Conservación, pp. 137-141. FANPE, GTZ-INRENA. Lima, Perú."
